title: Processes - Area between Curves - Functions of y

content.question: What is the area of the region in the first quadrant bounded on the left by the graph of <math alttext="x equals, the fraction with numerator y squared, and denominator 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> and on the right by the graph of <math alttext="x equals, 3 y minus 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="2 less than or equal to y, less than or equal to 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="10 minus, the fraction 56 over 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>56</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>
<math alttext="10 plus, the fraction 56 over 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>56</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 720 over 8, end fraction, minus, the fraction 112 over 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>720</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>112</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 504 over 6, end fraction, minus, the fraction 192 over 2, end fraction, plus 30" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>504</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>192</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mn>30</mn></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="10 minus, the fraction 56 over 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>56</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

topic.text: 8.5: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of y

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
